registration.title: Register
registration.pageSubtitle: Once you've created your account, you can read and write.
registration.formSubtitle1: If you register, you can not only read stories but also comment them and write your own ones.

login.bannerSubtitle: You can create your own content
login.sidebarText2: If you register, you can not only read stories but also comment them and write your own ones.
login.recoverInfo1: Enter your email address here so that we can send you an email to change your password.
login.recoverInfo2: Then check your mailbox and set a new password.
login.recoverInfo3: It can take 2-3 minutes to receive the email.
login.title: Login

myAccount.title: My Account
myAccount.bannerSubtitle: Vivamus eget laoreet ex. Phasellus mattis vestibulum nisl. Integer tempor lobortis sollicitudin. Phasellus a hendrerit diam, porta tempus ante.

search.title: Search and Borrow
search.bannerSubtitle: Phasellus mattis ante nec lorem finibus accumsan. Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas.
search.createRequestDescription: You can create a request here, others can respond to it if they have a suitable property. Search queries are valid for 30 days without entering a date, with a date entering up to the date (this can also be longer than 1 month).
search.createRequestNotification: We will check your search query and inform you as soon as it is activated.

messages.welcomeMessage: Your user account is now open and you can create rental inquiries and upload your own properties for rent.
messages.welcomeMessage2: We are happy that you are here!

forms.searchPlaceholder: What do you want to rent?
forms.streetDescription: Attention: Please select an address that appears in the dropdown menu as soon as you start entering the address.
forms.streetNotification: Your address will only be shown to another user when a rental is made, not before!
forms.requiredError: This field must not be empty
forms.emailNotFound: Account does not exist for this E-mail address
forms.notUniqueEmailError: A user account with this E-mail address already exists
forms.passwordRequirementError: The password must be at least 6 characters long, including 1 uppercase character and 1 numeric value
forms.passwordConfirmError: The password and the confirmation password must be identical
forms.phoneNumberDescription: We need your cell phone number so that we can inform you quickly of new rental inquiries and messages. Permitted number formats:
forms.phoneConfirmationSubtitle: Please enter the confirmation code that we sent to your mobile phone.
forms.resendVerificationCode1: Did not receive the code or entered the wrong number?
forms.paymentNotification: We need your account number so that we can pay you the rental income.
forms.deleteNotification: Here you can delete your account. Please note that the account cannot be restored and that your objects will also be deleted when you delete your account.
forms.priceLimitError: Please enter a rental amount between 0 and 9999
forms.moodDescription: It will be shown near your avatar and username
forms.userInfoDescription: This will be shown to everyone on your profile page

footer.footerSubtitle: Do you have any questions, inputs or feedback?
footer.footerSubtext1: We take that at any time via
footer.footerSubtext3: happy to meet you. Many Thanks!
